root.note:
This plugin is useful to open a file at a specific line, using the same format as compiler warning.

Examples:

  • On command line, instead of 'vim bh_rules.c +2450', you can use 'vim bh_rules.c:2450'. That's very useful when you do a copy/paste from your compiler messages.
  • The functionnality is also enabled into vim, with :e or :tabe.
